Disappearance Patterns, [reportid1, reportid2,...]  
Disappearance from Home, [44718, 21346, 71638, 621, 22979, 42288, 19294, 89314, 54748, 3936, 50191, 90944, 60513, 29876, 54519, 29575, 42689, 71161, 19559, 62321, 11464, 29817, 24290, 18247, 21934, 24779, 10763, 67331, 66939, 9442, 88835]

Disappearance due to Obsession, [44718, 42288, 19294, 89314, 54748, 50191, 19559, 62321, 101921, 101922, 101926]
